ocean.question: I have a big shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🐢 I look a little like an animal that lives in the garden but I live in ocean.
🐌 I am much bigger than snail.

ocean.question: I am big, blue, and have lots of salty water. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
💧 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in the coral reef. I have white and orange stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live with Nemo.
🤡 I am named after a type of entertainer.
🧡 I have the same color as orange.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that swims in the ocean, and I sing a special song. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I am a mammal, like you!
🐳 I am bigger than a bus.
🌊 Some people go to see me on special boat trips.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
🖐️ I have a lot of arms.
🪸 I can hide in coral reefs.

ocean.question: I am a fish with very sharp teeth. People don't want to swim near me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.
🚨 Some people are afraid of me.

ocean.question: I am a type of shelter under the sea, and lots of colorful fish like to live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I'm made of lots of tiny animals.
🌈 Lots of colorful fish live near me.
🐠 I can be many different colors!

ocean.question: I am an animal that is flat like a pancake and can sting you with my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥞 I am shaped like a breakfast food.
👋 It's best not to touch my tail.
🌊 I glide along the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a very big and old animal that lives in the ocean and has a shell so big that other animals can live on it. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm very old and slow.
🏠 Other animals can live on my back!
🌊 I can swim for a very, very long time.

ocean.question: I am a creature that looks like a horse and lives in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a head that looks like an animal you might ride.
🐠 I am a very small fish.
✨ I can hold onto things with my tail!

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. Toot toot! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown-ups drive me!
👪 I can carry your whole family.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can be very long. Choo choo! What am I?

hints.text: 🚝 I carry lots of people or things.
🚂 I have a whistle.
🛤️ I follow a special road made of metal.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
✈️ I fly very high above the ground.
💺 You sit in me to travel.

transport.question: I float on the water and can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I don't have wheels.
⚓ I might have a sail.
🛥️ I can take you across the ocean.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you have to pedal. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need a helmet to ride me safely.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🏞️ You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑️ I am usually white and red.

transport.question: I am a big truck that helps put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I have a ladder.
🔥 I use water to stop fires.
👩‍🚒 Firefighters ride in me.

transport.question: I fly but I don't have wings, and have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
➕ I can land on a building.
🚨 Sometimes I help rescue people.

transport.question: I am a car that takes people where they want to go, for a price. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I often drive around in cities.
💰 You have to pay me when I take you somewhere.
🚖 I often have a light on top.

transport.question: I can go underwater and explore the deep sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I do not float on top of the water.
⚓ I have a periscope so you can see what's happening above.
🔦 I can explore shipwrecks.
